5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“If the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) missed the four Rak’ah before the Zuhr, he would perform them after the two Rak’ah which come after the Zuhr.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ فَاتَتْهُ الأَرْبَعُ قَبْلَ الظُّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: One who misses the four Rak’ah before the Zuhr
